name: SPELLSHOT zAPPed Edition
description:
Play your app and ZAPP WIZARDS together!

SPELLSHOT zAPPed app features an animated world of magic, treasure and fantastical lands! Use your ZAPP WIZARDS to cast spells head-to-head on your iPad!

You’ll love:

• The way your iPad magically recognizes the wizards!
• The awesome ZAPP WIZARDS: NOXIUS! BREEZICUS! LANDOR! STORMICA!
• Casting each wizard’s unique battle spells.
• Collecting cool treasures!

For more information, check out www.spellshot.com
